title: Indigo: Synthetic Assets on Cardano
description: Cardano's DeFi ecosystem will require a scalable Plutus smart contract protocol to efficiently & securely bring real world assets on-chain.
solution: Open source protocol for users to mint synths that track the price of real world assets using Plutus smart contracts and oracle price feeds.
experience:
Team of 3 Haskell devs and 1 web dev (Plutus experience) 1 marketing lead and 2 tech consultants. 

Private MVPapp linked to PAB is working.
